purpose_text.para: Defines the current write pointer for the profiling buffer.

field_description.para: Current write address. Defines the virtual address of the next entry to be written to the buffer.
The architecture places restrictions on the values software can write to the pointer. For more information see .

note.para: As a result, an implementation might treat some of bits[M:0], where M is defined by PMBIDR_EL1.Align, as RES0.

field_description.para: On a management interrupt, PMBPTR_EL1 is frozen.
